SELECT c.id, c.card_id, c.content, c.created_at, c.updated_at,
c.writer_id, u.nickname AS writerName, u.profile_img AS writerProfileImg, u.email AS writerEmail FROM comment c LEFT JOIN user u ON c.writer_id = u.id WHERE c.card_id = #{cardId} AND c.deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY c.created_at ASC

SELECT c.id, c.card_id, c.parent_id, c.writer_id, c.content, c.created_at, c.updated_at, u.nickname AS writerName, u.profile_img AS writerProfileImg, u.email AS writerEmail FROM comment c LEFT JOIN user u ON c.writer_id = u.id WHERE c.id = #{id}
SELECT * FROM comment WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted_at IS NULL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (card_id, writer_id, parent_id, content, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{cardId}, #{writerId}, #{parentId}, #{content}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE comment SET content = #{content}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{commentId}
UPDATE comment SET deleted_at = NOW() WHERE card_id = #{cardId} AND deleted_at IS NULL
UPDATE comment cm JOIN card c ON cm.card_id = c.id SET cm.deleted_at = NOW() WHERE c.list_id = #{listId} AND cm.deleted_at IS NULL
UPDATE comment cm JOIN card c ON cm.card_id = c.id JOIN list l ON c.list_id = l.id SET cm.deleted_at = NOW() WHERE l.board_id = #{boardId} AND cm.deleted_at IS NULL
UPDATE comment cm JOIN card c ON cm.card_id = c.id JOIN list l ON c.list_id = l.id JOIN board b ON l.board_id = b.id SET cm.deleted_at = NOW() WHERE b.team_id = #{teamId} AND cm.deleted_at IS NULL
